entry.title: Rachaelâ€™s Christmas List 2024
entry.content:
Books

  • An Unfortunate Christmas Murder by Hannah Hendy book Â£5.98 Amazon ISBN 1800326513
  • Murder on the Dance Floor by Shirley Ballas book Â£9.39 Amazon ISBN 008558043
  • Cigars of the Pharoah Tintin book Â£10.99 Amazon ISBN 1405208031
  • NIV Journaling Bible by Hannah Dunnett Â£23.99 Amazon
  • Death of a Traitor by MC Beaton Â£9.39 Amazon ISBN 147212894x
  • Death of a Spy by MC Beaton book Â£9.99 waterstones ISBN 1538743310

DVDs

  • Allo,Allo Series 1 and 2 DVD Â£10.58 Amazon
  • And Then There Were None DVD (Directed by Douglas Booth) Â£8.99 Amazon

Clothes

  • Moomin Socks Waterstones Â£8.99
  • Long sleeve floral print top size 20 Bonmarche Â£18 no 9007198
  • Button hem leggins size 22 black Â£12 no 119912 Bonmarche
  • Long sleeve floral print pyjamas Â£18 size 20-22 Bonmarche no 9007627
  • Maisy womenâ€™s black ankle boot Â£19.99 size 4 Shoezone no 186026 (really want).
  • Barley lane hand warmers Â£8.50 Boots.
  • White/cream jacket size xl Â£18 Primark.

Other Stuff

  • Pink laptop bag Â£28.99 Amazon
  • Pink long purse Â£6.99 Amazon
  • Grey cell phone pouch mobile phones belt Â£13.99 Amazon
  • Mini houseplant tools pink Â£12.99 Waterstones (really want)
  • Silver heart cord necklace Â£10 Claires

entry.title: Sophieâ€™s Christmas List 2024
entry.content:
Manga

  • After School Etude Volume 1, Â£10.99 (also Waterstones), https://travellingman.com/products/after-school-etude-volume-1
  • Ogiâ€™s Summer Break, Volume 1 by Koikawa, Â£12.95, https://www.waterstones.com/book/ogis-summer-break-volume-1/koikawa/9781427873217
  • After We Gazed at the Starry Sky Volume 1 (also Forbidden Planet), Â£10.99, https://travellingman.com/collections/yaoi/products/after-we-gazed-at-the-starry-sky-volume-1
  • Cherry Magic! Thirty Years of Virginity Can Make You a Wizard?! Vol 1 by Yuu Toyota (also Forbidden Planet), https://www.waterstones.com/book/cherry-magic-thirty-years-of-virginity-can-make-you-a-wizard-1/yuu-toyota/9781646090297
  • The Snake Who Loved A Sparrow, Â£12.99, https://travellingman.com/collections/yaoi/products/the-snake-who-loved-a-sparrow

  • ğŸŒŸSpread Your Wings and Fly, Â£12.99, https://travellingman.com/products/spread-your-wings-and-fly

Books

  • This Fatal Kiss by Alicia Jasinska (hardback), Â£17.99, https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/This-Fatal-Kiss-by-Alicia-Jasinska/9781682637364
  • The Buried and the Bound by Rochelle Hassan (Paperback) (also Waterstones, Forbidden Planet), Â£10.99, https://www.queerlit.co.uk/products/the-buried-and-the-bound-paperback

  • ğŸŒŸThe Ojja-Wojja by Magdalene Visaggio (Paperback), Â£12.99, https://www.queerlit.co.uk/products/the-ojja-wojja

Graphic Novels

  • Tim Drake Robin Vol.1 Mystery at the Marina (also WHSmith and proud-geek.co.uk), Â£16.99, https://www.proudlion.co.uk/product/tim-drake-robin-vol-01-mystery-at-the-marina-tp/25501
  • ğŸŒŸYouth Group by Jordan Morris (author) and Bowen McCurdy (artist), Â£10.27, https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/9781250789235
  • ğŸŒŸThe Least We Can Do Volume 1 (Paperback) by Iolanda Zanfardino (author) and Elisa Romboli (artist) (also WHSmiths and www.proud -geek.co.uk), Â£14.99, https://www.waterstones.com/book/the-least-we-can-do-volume-1/iolanda-zanfardino/elisa-romboli/9781534399921
  • ğŸŒŸSave Yourself! by Bones Leopard (author), Kelly & Nichole Matthews (illustrator) (also WHSmiths and www.proud -geek.co.uk), Â£10.99, https://www.waterstones.com/book/save-yourself/bones-leopard/kelly-and-nichole-matthews/9781684158119
  • Cosmoknights (Book One) by Hannah Templer (author) (also Blackwells), Â£17.99, https://www.waterstones.com/book/cosmoknights-book-one/hannah-templer/9781603094542
  • ğŸŒŸThe Girl From The Sea (Paperback) by Molly Knox Ostertag (author, illustrator) (also Blackwells), Â£10.99, https://www.waterstones.com/book/the-girl-from-the-sea/molly-knox-ostertag/molly-knox-ostertag/9781338540574

Soft Toys

  • ğŸŒŸOriginal Squishmallows 7.5-inch - Minerva the Aqua Griffin, Â£9.00, Argos

Card and Board Games

  • ğŸŒŸCasting Shadows Ice Storm Expansion Â£17.99 (also from Zatu Games) https://travellingman.com/products/casting-shadows-ice-storm-expansion
  • ğŸŒŸCommand of Nature: Sand & Wind Expansion Â£13.70 (also from Zatu Games, Wayland Games, Asmodee UK) https://magicmadhouse.co.uk/unstable-games-command-of-nature-sand-wind-expansion
  • ğŸŒŸThe Tea Dragon Society Card Game Â£17.99 https://www.board-game.co.uk/product/the-tea-dragon-society-card-game/
  • Animals of Baker Street Â£22.39 (also from Waterstones) https://www.board-game.co.uk/product/animals-of-baker-street/

Critical Role Shop

  • Mollymauk Tealeaf â€œLong May He Reignâ€ T-Shirt, Large, Â£30.99
  • ğŸŒŸEssek Thelyss T-Shirt, Large, Â£20.30
  • Caduceus Clay Tea-Shirt, Large, Â£30.99
  • ğŸŒŸMollymauk Tealeaf (and Jester Lavorre) Oracle of the Moon Tarot Deck Â£25.99

entry.title: Markâ€™s Christmas List 2024
entry.content:
Soft Toys

  • Palm Pals Luna Bat https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0C599YKSB/
  • Squishmallows 7.5 inch Alonzo the Brown and White Highland Cow https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0CNY5G8JL/
  • Squishmallows 7.5 inch Hemkey the Sage Ferret https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0CNY34TP9/
  • Squishmallows Stackable Bubba Purple Cow https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0C6TRKQ8R/
  • ğŸŒŸSquishmallows 7.5 inch Boyle the Bat (Blue + Pink) (Asda or Smythâ€™s Toys)
  • ğŸŒŸOriginal Squishmallows Fuzz-A-Mallows 30cm Drew the Green Dragon Plush https://www.smythstoys.com/uk/en-gb/toys/fashion-and-dolls/squishmallows/30cm-squishmallows/original-squishmallows-fuzz-a-mallows-30cm-drew-the-green-dragon-plush/p/237664

RPG Stuff

  • A Life Well Lived (Cubicle 7) - Magic Madhouse https://magicmadhouse.co.uk/cubicle-7-entertainment-vault-5e-a-life-well-lived (Â£21.50)
  • ğŸŒŸBe Like A Crow â€˜Full Nest Bundleâ€™ - A Solo RPG - CritKit https://www.criticalkit.co.uk/products/be-like-a-crow-full-nest-bundle-1 (Â£23.99)
  • Critical Role Chibi Pin no. 28 Laudna - CritKit https://www.criticalkit.co.uk/products/critical-role-chibi-pin-no-28-laudna (Â£10.99)
  • ğŸŒŸStarfinder Alien Archive 2 Pocket Edition - Abebooks https://www.abebooks.co.uk/book-search/title/starfinder-rpg-alien-archive/author/augunas-alexander/ (Â£20ish)
  • Talâ€™Dorei Campaign Setting Reborn - Zatu Games https://www.board-game.co.uk/product/taldorei-campaign-setting-reborn/ (Â£35.49)
  • Starfinder Dice Set - Q Workshop https://q-workshop.com/en/rpg-dice-sets/1136/starfinder-dice-set-7 (Â£10.50)
  • Starfinder Devastation Ark Dice Set - Q Workshop https://q-workshop.com/en/rpg-dice-sets/1514/devastation-ark-dice-set (Â£10.50)
  • ğŸŒŸStarfinder Adventure Drift Crisis Case Files - DungeonLand https://www.dungeonland.co.uk/home/Starfinder-RPG-Drift-Crisis-Case-Files-p511000469 (Â£13)
  • Star Trek Adventures 2nd Edition - Zatu Games https://www.board-game.co.uk/product/star-trek-adventures-the-roleplaying-game-second-edition-core-rulebook/ (Â£35.49)
  • The Electric State RPG - Magic Madhouse https://magicmadhouse.co.uk/free-league-publishing-the-electric-state-rpg (Â£24.90)

CDs

  • Noel Gallagherâ€™s High Flying Birds - Council Skies (Deluxe 2xCD set) https://www.amazon.co.uk/Council-Skies-Deluxe-GALLAGHERS-FLYING/dp/B0BS98Z45W/ (Â£16.35)
  • Florence + the Machine - Dance Fever (Deluxe) https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B09V1Q9V5L/ (Â£9.49)
  • Taylor Swift - Speak Now (Taylorâ€™s Version) https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0C78K5BCK/ (Â£17.60)
  • ğŸŒŸSabrina Carpenter - Short nâ€™ Sweet Alternate Cover (from Polydor/UMG website) https://store.polydor.co.uk/products/short-n-sweet-alternate-cover-limited-edition-international-cd (Â£11.99)
  • Ed Sheeran - +(Plus) https://www.amazon.co.uk/Ed-Sheeran/dp/B004XZDT60/ (Â£4.50)
  • Ed Sheeran - =(Equals) https://www.amazon.co.uk/Ed-Sheeran-Bad-Habits-Shivers/dp/B09CRY341V/ (Â£4.07)

Graphic Novels

  • Rivers of London: Here Be Dragons https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/1787740927/ (Â£12.39)

Books

  • ğŸŒŸThe New and Improved Flask Mega-Tutorial (2024 Edition) https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0CPCTC64D/ (Â£27.48)
  • Kawaii: How to draw really cute stuff https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/1782215751/ (Â£7.55)
  • Kawaii: How to draw really cute animals https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/1782216596/ (Â£7.85)
  • How to Draw Kawaii https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/1488959323/ (Â£12.02)
  • Bored of Lunch - Six Ingredient Slow Cooker (not released until 5th Dec) https://www.amazon.co.uk/Bored-Lunch-Ingredient-Slow-Cooker/dp/1529914493/ (Â£10)
  • Bored of Lunch - Healthy Air Fryer 30 Minute Meals https://www.amazon.co.uk/Bored-Lunch-Healthy-Air-Fryer/dp/1529914515/ (Â£11)
  • Bored of Lunch - The Healthy Air Fryer Book https://www.amazon.co.uk/Bored-Lunch-Healthy-Fryer-Book/dp/1529903521/ (Â£9.49)
  • Pinch of Nom Air Fryer https://www.amazon.co.uk/Pinch-Nom-Air-Fryer-Slimming/dp/1035054566/ (Â£10)

Other Stuff

  • Florence + The Machine Andrea Zanatelli Daffodil Black Long Sleeve (Size XXL) https://store.polydor.co.uk/products/andrea-zanatelli-daffodil-black-long-sleeve?variant=45414536937762 (Â£35+P+P)
  • ğŸŒŸRapesco 1725 Adjustable 6-Hole Punch, 9 Sheet Capacity, Black https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B0CCVQNF6D/ (Â£13.35)
  • The Galaxy Astronomy Menâ€™s Novelty Tie https://www.tiesplanet.com/ties-c1/novelty-ties-c12/the-galaxy-astronomy-mens-novelty-tie-p17047 (Â£12.99)
  • ğŸŒŸNational Railway Museum Vintage Railway Posters A5 Diary https://www.calendarclub.co.uk/national-railway-museum-vintage-railway-posters-a5-diary-2025-320747/ (Â£9.99)
  • Wrendale â€˜A Dogâ€™s Lifeâ€™ Slim Calendar 2025 https://www.wrendaledesigns.co.uk/a-dog-s-life-slim-calendar-2025 (Â£8)
